Chbihi (INDRA Collaboration)Caloric curve for quasiprojectile (QP) particles is investigated, using the INDRA data set of $\mathrm{Xe}+\mathrm{Sn}$ at 50 MeV/u. A constant pressure condition is applied, approximated by the isotropic expansion of the QP source with a constant velocity, but neither limiting temperature nor backb…[Phys. Rev. papers.title: Baryons in the Nambu–Jona-Lasinio models
papers.summary: Author(s): Eric BlanquierThe octet and decuplet $SU{(3)}_{f}$ baryons are studied with the Polyakov, Nambu, and Jona-Lasinio model, in a diquark-quark approach, via the resolution of the Bethe-Salpeter equation. This work includes estimations of their masses according to the temperature and the baryonic density, with or wit…[Phys. Rev. C 113, 025201] Published Fri Feb 06, 2026
